All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
Represents a player's account for Memory Match.
AccountCollection
Represents a collection of accounts
Card
represents a card and contains the name of the card and the file name of the card image
CardSet
represents a set of all cards in a specified category
CountdownTimer
 
Guess
A single guess consists of the positions of the first and second cards.
LeaderboardPane
A BorderPane that displays a comparison of all users' top scores.
LoginPane
The login pane of our GUI; a place for users to login or create an account
Match4RoundPane
Starts a new Round of the Memory Game.
MemoryGameGUI
Starts the Sonoran Memory Game application.
Mode
 
Round
This class represents a round of memory match.
RoundPane
Starts a new Round of the Memory Game.
Sound
An object from this class represents a sound or music file and stores the name of the sound/music and its file path
SoundPlayer
Holds a collection of Sound objects in a SoundCollection ArrayList.
Table
represents a table of randomized cards, containing the specified number of pairs of cards all within the specified category
TitlePane
A BorderPane which displays the title screen, including "Start Game", "Leaderboard", and "Quit" buttons.
UserStatsPane
A BorderPane that displays the currently logged-in user's account name and stats
